data.text:
My predecessor retired and decided to 
put me in charge of Team <Sirius>.
data.processed:
<story>My predecessor retired and decided to 
<story>put me in charge of Team <Sirius>.

data.text:
In the beginning, I was just desperate 
to put the team back together, but―
data.processed:
<story>In the beginning, I was just desperate 
<story>to put the team back together, but―

data.text: One by one, Uma Musume joined along with their dreams.
data.processed: <story>One by one, Uma Musume joined along with their dreams.

data.text:
As part of the team, I learned that my role as trainer was to 
support those dreams.
data.processed:
<story>As part of the team, I learned that my role as trainer was to 
<story>support those dreams.

data.text:
To spend the days side-by-side with 
them as they chased their dreams.
data.processed:
<story>To spend the days side-by-side with 
<story>them as they chased their dreams.

data.text: And going forward, that's how Team <Sirius> would continue on―
data.processed: <story>And going forward, that's how Team <Sirius> would continue on―

data.text:
So you were here, Trainer-san. There's still some time until the 
main race will start.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>So you were here, Trainer-san. There's still some time until the 
<story>main race will start.

data.text:
"Japan's #1 Uma Musume" is taking the stage, 
so I wanted to see it from up close.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>"Japan's #1 Uma Musume" is taking the stage, 
<story>so I wanted to see it from up close.

data.text:
……Fufuu, the current <Sirius> started here too, 
on this stage, in this place, didn't it?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>……Fufuu, the current <Sirius> started here too, 
<story>on this stage, in this place, didn't it?

data.text:
It felt like an instant, but it also felt like forever ago…… 
It's a really mysterious feeling.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>It felt like an instant, but it also felt like forever ago…… 
<story>It's a really mysterious feeling.

data.text:
It felt like an instant, but it also felt like forever ago…… 
It's a really mysterious feeling.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>It felt like an instant, but it also felt like forever ago…… 
<story>It's a really mysterious feeling.

data.text: ……truly, that's how it felt.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>……truly, that's how it felt.

data.text: ……at that time, I'm grateful that you remained, McQueen.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>……at that time, I'm grateful that you remained, McQueen.

data.text: ……at that time, I'm grateful that you remained, McQueen.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>……at that time, I'm grateful that you remained, McQueen.

data.text: Because you were here, I was able to come this far.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Because you were here, I was able to come this far.

data.text: Because you were here, I was able to come this far.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Because you were here, I was able to come this far.

data.text:
I should be the one saying that― 
and I'm sure everyone on the team feels the same.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I should be the one saying that― 
<story>and I'm sure everyone on the team feels the same.

data.text:
Because Trainer-san was there, always supporting the Uma Musume 
and their dreams, we were able to continue running up until now.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Because Trainer-san was there, always supporting the Uma Musume 
<story>and their dreams, we were able to continue running up until now.

data.text: Because Trainer-san was there, we are still running today.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Because Trainer-san was there, we are still running today.

data.text: ……still running today, huh.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>……still running today, huh.

data.text:
The biggest event closing out the year, the 『Arima Kinen』. 
14 Uma Musume have come to this stage to compete.
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>The biggest event closing out the year, the 『Arima Kinen』. 
<story>14 Uma Musume have come to this stage to compete.

data.text:
In this battle of the century, half of the participants 
are G1 Uma Musume. The excitement of the spectators 
in the stands is palpable.
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>In this battle of the century, half of the participants 
<story>are G1 Uma Musume. The excitement of the spectators 
<story>in the stands is palpable.

data.text: Just which Uma Musume will take hold of glory in this Grand Prix?
data.name: Announcer
data.processed: <story>Just which Uma Musume will take hold of glory in this Grand Prix?

data.text:
To think I'd be standing here on such a big stage like a Grand 
Prix race, just a little while ago I never would have imagined it.
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>To think I'd be standing here on such a big stage like a Grand 
<story>Prix race, just a little while ago I never would have imagined it.

data.text: Tsuru-chan.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Tsuru-chan.

data.text:
Even now, I'm still a little frustrated that 
I couldn't enter any Classic races……
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Even now, I'm still a little frustrated that 
<story>I couldn't enter any Classic races……

data.text:
President Rudolph― a "Triple Crown Uma Musume", 
I couldn't help admiring her, and being in a Classic 
race was my dream when I was small.
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>President Rudolph― a "Triple Crown Uma Musume", 
<story>I couldn't help admiring her, and being in a Classic 
<story>race was my dream when I was small.

data.text:
『Satsuki Sho』 『Japan Derby』 『Kikka Sho』…… being unable to stand 
on that once in a lifetime stage even once……
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>『Satsuki Sho』 『Japan Derby』 『Kikka Sho』…… being unable to stand 
<story>on that once in a lifetime stage even once……

data.text:
But you know, even though I couldn't fulfill that dream, 
in exchange a newer, bigger dream took its place.
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>But you know, even though I couldn't fulfill that dream, 
<story>in exchange a newer, bigger dream took its place.

data.text: That I would definitely, definitely run together with everyone!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: <story>That I would definitely, definitely run together with everyone!

data.text:
I would do my best, catch up, and run with 
everyone― and then I wanted to win!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>I would do my best, catch up, and run with 
<story>everyone― and then I wanted to win!

data.text:
All of this is because I was able to keep watching 
Spe-chan and everyone else continue running! 
It's because you showed me that dream!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>All of this is because I was able to keep watching 
<story>Spe-chan and everyone else continue running! 
<story>It's because you showed me that dream!

data.text:
That's why, today, in this moment, 
I'm going to run with all I've got!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>That's why, today, in this moment, 
<story>I'm going to run with all I've got!

data.text: Yeah! Me too, I'll be running with all my strength!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah! Me too, I'll be running with all my strength!

data.text: ……Suu～…… Huu～……
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>……Suu～…… Huu～……

data.text: For the sake of this day, I've continued working hard―
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>For the sake of this day, I've continued working hard―

data.text:
Together with Ryan-oneesama's feelings, I'll definitely run 
through and take the lead.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>Together with Ryan-oneesama's feelings, I'll definitely run 
<story>through and take the lead.

data.text: Bright-san, she's so focused……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Bright-san, she's so focused……

data.text: Me too, I need to get serious……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Me too, I need to get serious……!

data.text: Thanks for waiting, Spe-chan. Finally, this day has come.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Thanks for waiting, Spe-chan. Finally, this day has come.

data.text: Grass-chan……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Grass-chan……

data.text:
Your run at the 『Japan Cup』, was truly wonderful. 
As you promised, you became the Uma Musume 
that I want to win against the most.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Your run at the 『Japan Cup』, was truly wonderful. 
<story>As you promised, you became the Uma Musume 
<story>that I want to win against the most.

data.text:
I'll show you that I can chase and surpass 
you, to take hold of my own dream.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>I'll show you that I can chase and surpass 
<story>you, to take hold of my own dream.

data.text: Me too, this time for sure, I'll show you that I can surpass you!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Me too, this time for sure, I'll show you that I can surpass you!

data.text: As "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", I'll win against Grass-chan!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>As "Japan's #1 Uma Musume", I'll win against Grass-chan!

data.text:
Nakayama's main race, the 『Arima Kinen』, 
the participating Uma Musume make their appearance on the turf!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Nakayama's main race, the 『Arima Kinen』, 
<story>the participating Uma Musume make their appearance on the turf!

data.text:
'The one to overturn the "Golden Generation" 
will be me!' T. M. Opera O!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>'The one to overturn the "Golden Generation" 
<story>will be me!' T. M. Opera O!

data.text:
Hidden deep within her heart is an impassioned pride! 
The Mejiro family's preeminent stayer, Mejiro Bright!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Hidden deep within her heart is an impassioned pride! 
<story>The Mejiro family's preeminent stayer, Mejiro Bright!

data.text:
This Uma Musume doesn't know the meaning of the words 'giving 
up'! The late-bloomer, and secret weapon of the "Golden 
Generation", Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>This Uma Musume doesn't know the meaning of the words 'giving 
<story>up'! The late-bloomer, and secret weapon of the "Golden 
<story>Generation", Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi!

data.text:
The returnee with the lovely chestnut hair, but within her heart 
dwells the Japanese spirit! The "Monster" with 2 consecutive 
Grand Prix victories, Grass Wonder!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>The returnee with the lovely chestnut hair, but within her heart 
<story>dwells the Japanese spirit! The "Monster" with 2 consecutive 
<story>Grand Prix victories, Grass Wonder!

data.text:
And finally, carrying the dreams of all of Japan, and grasping a 
splendid victory, the "Supreme Commander of Japan", Special Week!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>And finally, carrying the dreams of all of Japan, and grasping a 
<story>splendid victory, the "Supreme Commander of Japan", Special Week!

data.text: Oh! Spe's finally made her appearance!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Oh! Spe's finally made her appearance!

data.text: It looks like…… she isn't nervous at all.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>It looks like…… she isn't nervous at all.

data.text: Rather than that, she looks more dignified!
data.name: Bob-cut Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>Rather than that, she looks more dignified!

data.text:
As expected of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"～! 
Let's cheer with all we've got!
data.name: Uma Musume with Bangs
data.processed:
<story>As expected of "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"～! 
<story>Let's cheer with all we've got!

data.text: Yeah! Do your beeeeeest～ Spe-chaaaaan～! Uoooooooh～!!!!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: <story>Yeah! Do your beeeeeest～ Spe-chaaaaan～! Uoooooooh～!!!!

data.text: Do your best～ "Supreme Commander of Japan"～!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>Do your best～ "Supreme Commander of Japan"～!

data.text: Trainer-san, you should try calling out to her too.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san, you should try calling out to her too.

data.text:
So that Special Week-san can once again become "Japan's #1 Uma 
Musume" for everyone.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>So that Special Week-san can once again become "Japan's #1 Uma 
<story>Musume" for everyone.

data.text:
Yes, so that the mantle created by <Sirius> so far, 
can carry on with another amazing race……
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Yes, so that the mantle created by <Sirius> so far, 
<story>can carry on with another amazing race……

data.text: I wonder what the next one to join the team will be like.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>I wonder what the next one to join the team will be like.

data.text:
……no matter what dream the next girl brings, I'll do my best to 
make sure we can fulfill that dream, together.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……no matter what dream the next girl brings, I'll do my best to 
<story>make sure we can fulfill that dream, together.

data.text: Alright, let's all cheer her on!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Alright, let's all cheer her on!

data.text: Yeah, show them what <Sirius> can really do, Spe!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Yeah, show them what <Sirius> can really do, Spe!

data.text: Yeah, show them what <Sirius> can really do, Spe!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Yeah, show them what <Sirius> can really do, Spe!
